body_html:
@yaroslavvb Was that a typo in your latest post? (Edit: Was fixed.)
Btw., why is that that NCWH is faster than NHWC? (Related StackOverflow question.) Is that also the official Nvidia statement, or have people just seen that in benchmarks? Do you have any references for such benchmarks?

Btw., why is that that NCWH is faster than NHWC? (Related StackOverflow question.) Is that also the official Nvidia statement, or have people just seen that in benchmarks? Do you have any references for such benchmarks?
body:
@yaroslavvb Was that a typo in your latest post? (Edit: Was fixed.)
Btw., why is that that NCWH is faster than NHWC? ([Related StackOverflow question.](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44280335/how-much-faster-is-nchw-compared-to-nhwc-in-tensorflow-cudnn)) Is that also the official Nvidia statement, or have people just seen that in benchmarks? Do you have any references for such benchmarks?
